title: 3/4″ Clear
description: Self compacting. For drainage and back fill.

title: 3/4″ Crusher Run
description: Road base/top coat before asphalt. A sub base for concrete. Can be used for driveways.

title: High Performance Base
description: Under pavers/patio slabs. Back fill/sewer water main applications.

title: Screenings
description: Under pavers/patio slabs. Good for paths.

title: Concrete Blend
description: A 3:2 mix of Gravel and Sand. Add a polymer and get concrete.

title: Crushed (Recycled) Concrete
description: A cheap fill option. Good for filling holes.

title: Concrete Sand
description: Bedding layer. Making concrete. Amending soil (loosening up clay.) Chicken coops.
